runs.comm: angles the first ball from a good length into the right-hander's pads, Khakurel tries to glance behind square but doesn't make contact

that's in the air off the leading edge but flies just over the fielder at cover! Mahmudullah jumped to his right with one arm outstretched but could not reach it. Khakurel wanted to play that on the leg side but closed the face too early and got a leading edge
gets behind the line this time and defends with a straight bat
once again he tries to glance behind square but misses, this time they get a leg bye of the thigh
after angling four balls into Khakurel, Mortaza gets one to leave Pun from a good length, the batsman stays in his crease and prods, the ball beats the outside edge
once again Pun is beaten, he stays back and pokes outside off as the ball whizzes past
the ball nips back into the right-hander from over the wicket and hits Khakurel on the outside of his front thigh
that's gone wide down leg side and Mushfiqur moves across to collect, first extra of the innings
once again the ball slants down leg side after pitching short of a length in line with the stumps, the batsman moves across his stumps to let it pass
short of a length outside off, Khakurel gets on top of the bounce and plays it behind point, along the ground
blocked off the front foot towards cover
Pun tries to carve the ball over the slip but is beaten by the extra bounce outside off
up and over, Pun pushes on the front foot and throws his bat at a full ball outside off, he slashes it on the up and clears the fielder at point comfortably
Hossain replies with the short ball and Pun is beaten on the hook, it's too high though to the over is not yet finished
that ball took off from a good length outside off stump and beat Pun for pace and bounce, he began to push at it and then checked his shot

Khakurel drives away from his body at a fuller ball outside off and gets an outside edge that flies down to third man, it falls short of Al-amin on the boundary. Mortaza wasn't happy, he wanted the fielder to run in and attempt the catch
Pun is beaten by a short of a length ball outside off
short of a length and straighter this time, Pun is hurried for time as he swivels and tries to pull, he gets hit on the glove

short of a length outside off stump, Khakurel stays in his crease and closes the face of the bat to try and turn the ball square, it flies off the leading edge wide of the solitary slip towards third man
Mortaza pitches on a good length around middle and off and seams the ball away from the right-hander, squaring him up and beating the outside edge as he played from the crease
a fuller length on a straighter line, the batsman gets behind the ball and blocks
Khakurel goes on the attack, stepping out and slogging down the ground, he makes poor contact but manages to get enough bat on it to clear the fielder at mid-off
worked off the hips through square
a fuller ball on middle stump, Pun taps it gently towards mid-on and runs
that's a wayward delivery, very short and wide down leg side
that was rather wide outside off but Umpire Dar lets it go, Khakurel slashed but could not reach it
moves across his stumps and drives off his pads, can't beat Nasir at midwicket

there's the first wicket! Khakurel slogged at one that wasn't short enough to play across the line to, he got a top edge that was taken comfortably by Razzak at mid off. The bat turned in Khakurel's hand as he made contact with the bottom part of it.
Malla's off the mark with a neat flick off the pads, a wristy shot. Anamul Haque is in hot pursuit and he dives to prevent the boundary at midwicket
Pun lays into this one, slogging it with the bottom of the bat over midwicket, he dragged it from far outside off and hammered it. Mashrafe's length was much too short
defended from the crease towards cover
a length ball outside off, Pun pushes forward and opens the face to steer behind point
Malla moves across his stumps once again and flicks wristily in front of square
Pun tries to cut without moving his feet and is beaten by a delivery that skids through a bit low outside of stump
gives the ball some air outside off, driven to long off for a single
slows it up through the air, Pun strides forward and blocks
makes room by moving outside leg stump, Shakib follows Pun, cramping him for room, Pun ends up chipping to mid-on, Malla runs but gets sent back, he makes it safely
played into the leg side off a thick inside edge
shot! Malla backed away outside leg, Shakib slowed his pace quite a bit, Malla waited and then unwound, launching the ball flat over cover for a one-bounce four
Shakib gets a bit too straight this time, drifting down leg, Malla glances and manages to get a little bat on it, the ball beats the chase to the fine-leg boundary

that's the end of Pun, he's spooned the ball straight to short cover. Al-Amin Hossain changed ends and has done the job for Bangladesh. He pitched on a good length around off and Pun drove away from his body without proper footwork
Khadka gets on top of the bounce outside off and steers towards third man

Malla's gone now! Lbw! Two in three balls. Al-Amin Hossain pitched fuller and straighter, getting the ball to nip into the right-hander. Malla was half forward and looking to play across the line when the ball smashed into his front pad. That looked pretty adjacent, as long as there was no inside edge. Umpire Tucker had no doubt. He was right.
defended on the front foot on the off side
short ball outside off, the batsman lets it pass
played off the front foot towards midwicket for a single
a full ball on middle and leg, Vesawkar moves forward and across to flick in front of square, he slips at the end of the first run. There's lots of dew.
good length outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
short ball over off stump, the batsman sways and lets it pass
another short ball and Vesawkar's pull is terribly timed, it falls limply in the vacant midwicket region
a fuller delivery outside off, Khadka moves forward and laces the ball through cover with a well-timed drive, well placed too
shorter length and Khadka swivels to pull in front of square, this was not timed as well
good length on off and middle stump, tapped from the crease towards midwicket
that's too short and Vesawkar nailed it with a powerful pull through midwicket, he got on top of the bounce and slapped the ball hard
a much better and fuller length outside off stump, Vesawkar pushes at it and is beaten
fuller and straighter again, played back to the bowler
played from the crease towards point
defended from the crease towards the fielder at point once again
good length on off and middle, defended on the off side
good length but a bit too straight, worked off the pads through square
nudged towards midwicket, no run once again
flicked off the pads to the fielder at short fine leg
played back towards the bowler, Nasir moves quickly to his right and fields
driven on the front foot on the up towards point
bowled full into the pads, nudged from the crease towards square leg
a shorter and flatter ball around off stump, played from the crease on the off side
steps out of the crease to hit down the ground but gets an inside edge through midwicket
that's going to be called wide down leg side
defended on the off side
goes back in the crease and works the ball through midwicket
steps out and works the ball into the leg side
comes out of his crease again and plays the ball towards long on
Vesawkar stays in his crease this time and plays the ball towards cover
a short ball and Vesawkar goes back to cut through the off side, he gets a bottom edge into the pitch and towards the bowler
slower ball on middle and leg, Vesawkar gets down on one knee and sweeps behind square
Khadka tries to hit hard down the ground but gets an inside edge in front of square leg
that's too straight and Khadka gets inside the line to flick off his pads firmly enough to beat the fielder on the square leg boundary
he's beaten outside the off stump this time
Nasir strays down leg side, that's a wide
third man is in the circle and Khadka opens the face to steer the ball towards him, Al-amin Hossain misfields and allows the boundary
third man has been pushed back and this time he fields the ball as it rolls towards him off the outside edge of the drive
beaten outside the off stump once again
driven down the ground for a single
tossed up outside leg from over the wicket, the batsman reverse sweeps and hits the ball to the fielder on the sweeper boundary
Khadka steps out but is not to the pitch of the ball and he plays it towards midwicket
pitches outside leg stump and Khadka sweeps, he can't beat short fine leg though
Khadka steps out again and lifts the ball over the infield at midwicket, there's a fielder in the deep though and it gets to him on the first bounce

Mushfiqur's missed a stumping! Vesawkar charged and slogged, he was yards outside his crease when he was beaten by the low bounce. The ball narrowly missed leg stump and Mushfiqur failed to collect cleanly
Vesawkar gets beaten again and loses balance a little, Mushfiqur once again fumbles, that's a second stumping gone abegging
Khadka lofts the ball down the ground, he mis-times it though and the ball falls well short of long off, they run a second and Mushfiqur is yelling at the fielder for allowing it
that bounces quite a bit from short of a length but the line is down leg side
Khadka throws his bat at one outside off but misses
once again Khadka mis-times the hit through midwicket
a full toss outside off stump, the batsman slashes hard and gets an outside edge that dies on the keeper and goes wide of him to race to the third man boundary
Vesawkar mis-times another slog and gets a single on the off side
in the blockhole but Khadka manages to prise it out on the leg side for a single
Khadka tries to reverse sweep but fails to connect properly, there's half an appeal for lbw but it might have pitched outside leg stump from over the wicket
steps out of his crease and chips the ball down the ground towards long on
steps out again but isn't to the pitch of the ball, plays it towards mid-on, these two have now added 50 for the fourth wicket
Vesawkar clears his front foot and slogs, he makes poor contact and plays the ball tamely towards square leg
steps out of his crease and defends on the off side
Khadka steps forward and outside leg to hit inside out through extra cover, he mis-times the ball towards long off
Reza returns and begins with a short of a length ball on a wicket to wicket line, the batsman pulls but can't beat midwicket
that's extremely wide outside off stump, the length was full and irrelevant
shot! Finally Khadka has middled one. He made room by moving outside leg and drove the ball powerfully through extra cover
now he tries to move towards the off side and get into position to scoop the ball over the keeper, he fails
Khadka slogs hard once again, trying to hit the ball over cow corner, he gets a thick outside edge that flies towards third man, the fielder doesn't try and rush in to catch the ball
oh well done, Vesawkar moves towards the off this time and executes the scoop better than Khadka did, he gets enough bat on it to send it over the man at short fine leg
width outside off stump and Vesawkar flays the ball through point to help Nepal take 14 off the over
Khadka this time! Making room by moving outside leg and drilling the ball hard along the ground through extra cover, superb drive
nearly yorked himself this time and ends up playing it on the off side
Khadka steps out to take the ball on the full and drives to long off for a single
an appeal for lbw after the batsman gets down low to paddle sweep, the impact was outside off stump
full ball on off and middle stump, Khadka makes room and drives hard back at the bowler, Razzak can't make a clean stop
Vesawkar makes room by moving outside leg stump, Razzak cramps him with a full ball on middle and leg, the batsman manages to drive inside out on the off side
that's too short and wide, Vesawkar makes room and slashes the ball wide of the fielder on the third man boundary
banged in short and Vesawkar is beaten on the upper cut
short of a length again, Vesawkar slaps it over midwicket, he hasn't timed it well so the fielder at long on will be able to cut it off

in the blockhole, Vesawkar digs it out on the off side and sprints, Mortaza gets to the ball quickly but misses the stumps at the striker's end, Khadka would have been well short had there been a direct hit
driven straight down the ground but not timed well, Tamim's pick up is clean but his throw is wide and the batsmen complete the second
bowled him! Khadka moved across his stumps to trying and chip over the fielder at short fine leg. The length was too full for it, the line was too straight for it. Leg stump took a beating
that's full and wide outside off, a good tactic because the batsman moved far outside leg to make room and eventually he could not reach the ball
full and straight this time, clubbed towards long off, that was in the air and close to the bowler's left hand but not really a catch
that's a very high bouncer, Mushfiqur leaps to collect it after the ball passes high over Bhandari's head
Bhandari tries to scoop the ball over the keeper and misses
Bhandari slogs wildly at a length ball outside off and is beaten, he just needs to give his set partner the strike
once again he slashes outside off and is beaten. Why on earth aren't they trying to run a leg bye? Plenty of wickets in hand, two balls remaining. I don't get it.
well, they have attempted the leg bye this time and Mushfiqur has scored a direct hit to catch Vesawkar short. Bhandari slogged in vain again and failed to connect.
